hero.heading: Computer Science Society
hero.description: A student-run organization committed to provide a community for Computer Science students.

aboutUs.heading: About Us
aboutUs.subheading: TLDR - We're a group of Computer Science students who love to learn, code, and have fun!

cards.heading: Learn
cards.description: Join a passionate community of students dedicated to exploring the world of technology beyond the classroom.

cards.heading: Code
cards.description: Improve your programming skills through our coding workshops, hackathons, and challenges.

cards.heading: Connect
cards.description: Expand your network and meet other students, professors, and tech professionals.

cards.heading: Enjoy
cards.description: Balance work and fun with our diverse range of fun events, from game nights to movie nights.

subheading.futureEvents: Join us at our upcoming events!
subheading.onGoingEvents: There's currently an event going on! Join us!
subheading.pastEvents: We currently don't have any upcoming events. Check out our past events while we plan new ones for you!

highlights.subheading: Discover the latest insights and updates in our highlights.
